content: अनुसारः {@--1@} Going after, following (<ab>fig.</ab> also); pursuit; व्याधानुसारचकिता हरिणीव यासि <ls>Mk. 1. 17</ls>; शब्दानुसारेण अवलोक्य <ls>Ś. 7</ls> looking in the direction of the sound; कपटानुसारकुशलः <ls>Mk. 9. 5</ls> following up or tracing fraud. {@--2@} Conformity to, accordance with, suitability, conformity to usage; किरणानुसारगलितेन <ls>K. 137</ls>, <ls n="K.">194</ls>, <ls n="K.">204</ls>; धर्मशास्त्रानुसारेण <ls>Y. 2. 1.</ls> {@--3@} Custom, usage, established practice; अनुसारादधिका (वृद्धिः) <ls>Ms. 8. 152.</ls> {@--4@} Received or established authority, especially of codes of law. {@--5@} Nature, natural condition of anything. {@--6@} Currency, prevalence. {@--7@} Consequence, result.
